snippet.title: Antisphere - Official Trailer (2017)
snippet.description:
Antisphere is a fast-paced arcade shooter where your goal is simple: blast away the competition. It’s just two ships in one arena - going head-to-head. You can customize your ship and your loadout to make sure that your loadout is optimal. Play against friends and see if you got the speed and reflexes needed to climb the ranks.

Antisphere will be available on Steam from July 14th 2017. It will also be available on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One, but at a later date.

Pre-order (Steam): http://store.steampowered.com/app/489570/Antisphere/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/antispheregame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/antispheregame?lang=en
